```{r}
set.seed(1)
# g <- sample_gnm(2e3, 4e3)
g <- sample_fitness_pl(4e3, 6e3, 2.5)
# g <- graphs$pg
g <- largest_component(g)
d <- diameter(g)

dist_frac <- function(f1, f2) {
  vc <- vcount(g)
  v1 <- sample(1:vc, round(f1*vc))
  v2 <- sample(1:vc, round(f2*vc))
  return(distances(g = g,
                   v = v1,
                   to = v2,
                   diameter = d))
}
n <- 20
x1 = seq(0.1, 1, length.out = n)
x2 = seq(0.1, 1, length.out = n)
vs <- matrix(NA, nrow=n,ncol=n)
ts <- matrix(NA, nrow=n,ncol=n)
for (i in 1:n) {
  x2_i <- x2[i]
  # ts[i,] <- unlist(lapply(x1, function(x) (x2_i + x)))
  vs[i,] <- sapply(x1, function(x) (x2_i*x))
  ts[i,] <- timed_lapply(x1, dist_frac, f2 = x2_i, return_times_only = TRUE, times_run = 20)
}
ts
vsp <- ggplot(melt(vs), aes(Var1, Var2)) +                           # Create heatmap with ggplot2
  geom_tile(aes(fill = value)) + 
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "black", high = "white")
vsp
tsp <- ggplot(melt(ts), aes(Var1, Var2)) +                           # Create heatmap with ggplot2
  geom_tile(aes(fill = value)) + 
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "black", high = "white")
tsp
rs <- vs/ts
rsp <- ggplot(melt(rs), aes(Var1, Var2)) +                           # Create heatmap with ggplot2
  geom_tile(aes(fill = value)) + 
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "black", high = "white")
rsp
```
